title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around         Vehicles sometimes backed up nearly three miles before the construction of the parking garage during the 1990's. NPS Photo  Traffic while traveling to and from Mount Rushmore on area highways is typically not congested, but is heaviest during the middle of the day. Once you arrive at Mount Rushmore traffic back-ups sometimes occur at the entrance to the parking garage, where the large volume of vehicles passing through the gates can cause congestion. Paying for parking is usually a quick process. You can help by having payment ready before you get to the gate. June, July and August are the busiest months, and July 3rd and 4th are the busiest individual days.
